titleStmt.title: The modest cavallieres advice together with a letter to the inhabitants of the Isle of Wight where His Sacred Majesty is now remaining.
titleStmt.author: C. G. (Charles Gerbier)

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Gerbier by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
